caption.title: Observed and CMIP5 multi-model-simulated time series.
caption.p: ( a) March NH SIE anomaly ( b) March Barents Sea SIE anomaly ( c) Annual global mean SAT anomaly. Blue solid line: CMIP5 multi-model ensemble mean; light blue shading: spread (±1 s.d.) across multi-model ensemble members; blue dashed line: linear trend. Observations (SIE from NSIDC and SAT from the average of three reanalysis datasets—NCEP/NCAR, ERA-Interim and MERRA) and their linear trends are shown in red solid lines with circle markers and red dashed lines, respectively.
